text.text_translated: Many people living in Berlin said that killing pigs was unnecessarily cruel. The debate between hunters and animal lovers grew heated. In response to the protests, the city leaders chose a more peaceful approach. Instead of killing pigs they built fences and made feeding them illegal. Time will tell if this plan works. It may be a losing battle because milder winters now allow more pigs than in the past.
